title: Lost Your Driver’s License? What to Do in the US and Abroad

steps.title: Call the police’s non-emergency line.
steps.content: Call the police’s non-emergency line. Even if you don’t think your license was stolen, it is still a good idea to make a police report. This will help prevent identity theft if your license is found. Tell the officer that you would like to file a report. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Explain when and where you lost your license.
steps.content: Explain when and where you lost your license. If you’re not sure when you lost your license, tell the police the last time that you used it. They may ask if you think your license was stolen. [2] X Research source If you have no reason to think it was stolen, you might say, “No, but I would like to file a report just in case someone finds it and tries to use it." If your wallet was stolen or lost, you should also report your lost credit and debit cards and any lost cash.

steps.title: Ask for a copy of the police report.
steps.content: Ask for a copy of the police report. If your identity is stolen because of the lost license, this document can protect you against fraud. The police can mail it to you, or you can pick it up at the station. If someone else tries to use your license, show this document as proof that your license was stolen. [3] X Research source People sometimes use lost or stolen IDs to get out of traffic violations or to obtain alcohol illegally.

steps.title: Determine if you need to report to another agency in your state.
steps.content: Determine if you need to report to another agency in your state. For most states, contacting your police department and DMV is all you need to do. That said, some states have slightly different requirements. Look up the process for your state by simply searching “report lost license in [your state]” online. [4] X Research source For example, in Illinois, you need to visit your local Secretary of State office. In Washington state, you may be asked to report the lost or stolen license to the License Integrity Unit by emailing fraud@dol.wa.gov. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Call your local DMV to report the lost license.
steps.content: Call your local DMV to report the lost license. The DMV will likely flag your old license in case somebody else tries to use it. The DMV may also tell you how to replace the license in your state. [6] X Trustworthy Source USA.GOV Official website for the United States federal government Go to source To find your local DMV, click this link .

steps.title: Look up how to get a duplicate license in your state.
steps.content: Look up how to get a duplicate license in your state. A duplicate license is the same as your original license. The process for getting a duplicate license can vary by state. While many states will require you to fill out a form at the DMV, some states have slightly different processes. [7] X Research source For example, you must renew your license if you lose it in Colorado. Follow the same process as you would to renew it. Some states, like Florida or Tennessee, allow you to apply for a replacement online. Most states, however, require you to apply in person at a DMV. You can look up the requirements by state by following this link .

steps.title: Collect alternative identity documents to bring with you.
steps.content: Collect alternative identity documents to bring with you. When replacing your driver’s license, you must prove your identity. Since you don’t have your license, bring multiple types of alternative identification. Depending on your state, the following documents may be acceptable: [8] X Research source Passport Government ID Military ID Birth certificate Social Security Card Vehicle insurance policy in your name Mail with your registered address

steps.title: Fill out the proper form online or in person.
steps.content: Fill out the proper form online or in person. To save time, find the form on your state’s DMV website. Print it and fill it out. Bring the filled form with you to the office. If you don’t have a printer, you can fill out the form at the DMV. [9] X Research source In most cases, this form will be the same as applying for a new driver’s license. A box on the form may ask if your last license was lost or stolen. Check the right box.

steps.title: Get a ride to the DMV.
steps.content: Get a ride to the DMV. It is illegal to drive without a license in the US. Do not drive to the DMV. Ask a friend to give you a ride, take public transport, or get a taxi. The DMV will issue you a temporary license that you can use after you apply for a replacement. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Pay the replacement fee.
steps.content: Pay the replacement fee. The fee can vary from state to state. Generally, it costs between $10 and $30 USD to get a replacement license. Once all the steps are completed, you will receive a paper license that will be good for 60 to 90 days (depending on where you live). [11] X Research source You’ll receive your plastic license by mail in 3 to 4 weeks. Some states can print off your license right away. In this case, you will not need to wait for the plastic license to arrive in the mail. Ask the clerk at your DMV for more information about your state’s rules and regulations on temporary paper licenses.

steps.title: Avoid identity theft by reporting your ID missing right away.
steps.content: Avoid identity theft by reporting your ID missing right away. Someone can steal your identity if they have the personal information from your driver’s license. [12] X Trustworthy Source USA.GOV Official website for the United States federal government Go to source This is why it’s important to file a report with the police if you misplace your ID or believe it has been stolen. Unlike a credit card, you can’t put a “hold” or “freeze” on your driver’s license. Instead, you must file a physical report to flag and validate any misuse. Signs of identity theft include: [13] X Trustworthy Source USA.GOV Official website for the United States federal government Go to source Bills for things you didn’t purchase Information from credit cards you didn’t open Denials of loan applications Missing or lack of mail If you believe your identity has been stolen, report the crime by contacting The Federal Trade Commission (FTC) online at IdentityTheft.gov or calling 1-877-438-4338. [14] X Trustworthy Source USA.GOV Official website for the United States federal government Go to source

steps.title: Report the license to the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency in the UK.
steps.content: Report the license to the Driver and Vehicle Licensing Agency in the UK. The process for reporting a lost license in the UK is very similar to the US. Make a police report if you believe your license was stolen. Apply for a new license online through the DVLA website. Give the agency either your driving license number, National Insurance number, or passport number. [15] X Trustworthy Source Official UK government website Official website for the public sector of the UK government Go to source It costs £20 to get a new license. Apply online by clicking this link . If you find your license later, you must report it to the DVLA. Mail the old license to: DVLA Swansea SA99 1AB

steps.title: Visit a state service center in Australia.
steps.content: Visit a state service center in Australia. The process for reporting a lost license varies by state. In most states, you can get a new license online if you still have your license number. If you don’t have it, visit a state service center. Bring identity documents, such as a birth certificate, citizenship certificate, passport, or a license that expired less than 2 years ago. [16] X Research source File a police report if you think your driver’s license was stolen. You do not need to do this if you lost the license. This usually costs around $70 AUD.

steps.title: Contact your local Motor Registration Division office in Canada.
steps.content: Contact your local Motor Registration Division office in Canada. Although it can vary by province, typically, you will need to apply for a new license in person. You will need to provide your name, address, and birthday. A replacement license can cost around $30 to $40 CAD. [17] X Research source Many states recommend filing a police report if you lost your license to protect yourself against identity theft.
